dcterms:creator: P. Arbelaez
M. Maire
C. Fowlkes
J. Malik
dcterms:description: The BSDS500 dataset contains 500 test images, which are split into 3 different sets, each having a few human segmented boundary ground-truth images. It is used as a benchmark tool for edge detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: BSDS500
